Shared chart properties

Many times multiple charts are used to tell a more complex story about the interrelationship between datasets. Often this means that the charts need to share the same visual scale along their axis, even if the supplied data doesn't include these data values. d4 allows you to specify specific min and max values for each axis, which is demonstrated in the following example:
